required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Apatinib in the Treatment of Patients With EGFR T790M-Negative NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Controlled Phase II Clinical Trial of Apatinib in Combination With EGFR-TKI Versus EGFR-TKI for Non-squamous, Non-small Cell Lung Cancer(NSCLC) With T790M-negative After the Failure of EGFR-TKI Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute

brief_summary.textblock: This phase 2 study is designed to evaluate the safety and activity of apatinib,a tyrosine kinase inhibitor that selectively inhibits the vascular endothelial growth factor receptor-2, in combination with EGFR-TKI in NSCLC with T790M-negative after the failure of EGFR-TKI therapy.

primary_outcome.description: the length of time during and after the treatment of a disease that a patient lives with the disease but it does not get worse

secondary_outcome.description: The length of time from either the date of diagnosis or the start of treatment that half of the patients in a group of patients diagnosed with the disease are still alive.
From first response to the date of first documented disease progression
the proportion of patients with a best overall response of CR, PR or SD in the whole body, as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator.
the proportion of patients with a best overall confirmed response of CR or PR in the whole body as assessed per RECIST 1.1 by the investigator
Analysis of changes from baseline using the quality of life (QoL) instrument

arm_group.description: Every 4 weeks 1 cycle, evaluated the efficacy and safety once every 2 cycles, treat until disease progression or intolerable toxicity
Every 4 weeks 1 cycle, evaluated the efficacy and safety once every 2 cycles, treat until disease progression or intolerable toxicity

intervention.description: Apatinib mesylate tablets 250 mg qd po, if the patient can tolerate the toxic side effects, adjust the dose to 500mg qd po after 1 week.
Imatinib tablets, 125 mg tid po; gefitinib tablets, 250 mg qd po; erlotinib tablets, 150 mg qd po

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Sichuan Cancer Hospital and Research Institute
